snippet: Afghan officials made a small step toward scoring the big-name Western foreign investment they have long sought, which they hope would pique the interest of other big American and European companies.
abstract: Exxon Mobil is weighing a bid on a modest oil concession in the country’s north, and Afghan and American officials are eagerly casting the news as a sign of confidence in Afghanistan, even though there was no guarantee that the company would actually bid.
lead_paragraph: Afghan officials made a small step toward scoring the big-name Western foreign investment they have long sought, which they hope would pique the interest of other big American and European companies.

headline.seo: Exxon Mobil Signals Interest in Afghan Oil Concession
headline.main: As Exxon Mobil Weighs Oil Bid, Afghans Move Closer to a Foreign Investment Goal
headline.print_headline: As Exxon Mobil Weighs Oil Bid, Afghans Move Closer to a Foreign Investment Goal
